The final solution is:

1. Epic movies are watched by the person with the rabbit (Pet M).
2. The accountant (Job 2) is Chinese (Nationality 2).
3. Romance movies are watched by the dancer (Job 3).
4. The owner of the rabbit (Pet 5) is on the left of the owner of the snake (Pet 6).
5. Epic movies are watched on the left of those watching sports movies.
6. The software-developer (Job 6) is on the left of the owner of the chinchilla (Pet 2).
7. The colombian (Nationality 1) is an accountant (Job 1).
8. The person watching scientific movies is the owner of the horse (Pet 9).
9. The ferret (Pet 3) is owned by the colombian (Nationality 3).
10. The colombian (Nationality 4) is the person watching action movies.
11. The pakistani (Nationality 7) is on the right of the person watching sports movies, and they are also a project-manager (Job 7).
12. The japanese (Nationality 5) are the ones who watch epic movies (Movie-Genre 5).
13. The dressmaker (Job 4) is on the right of the project-manager (Job 7).
14. The project-manager (Job 7) is on the left of those watching epic movies.
15. The project-manager (Job 7) is on the right of the dressmaker (Job 5).
